item.title: [RELEASE]Zeus' Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:25, topic:249681”][quote author=kedonot1 link=topic=329101.msg2576347#msg2576347 date=1228967351]

Thanks for the advice I always go fast, and I never put detail(don’t know how >.<). I learn from my models that are shit, and didn’t you all read the part about Zeus? It said that he shot out the lightning bolts from those 2 sides.

First
Get some software
NOT!!! PAINT
go to
www.paint.net
and download that
Zoom in
At the bottom
See on the scrim
theres grey.
Get a lighter gray and use that as a outline at the bottom.
Theres some advice.

Lol, your completely off the plot mate.
This was not made made in paint (Although it does look like it).

It was made in a modelling program called Metasequoia.

im just saying to practice.

[/quote]

No your not, you were saying to download paint.net, which isn’t even a modelling program.[/quote]

ur gay,
I mean’t to practice his graphic skills… shadowing, capacity. ect.

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE]Zeus' Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @ringer24 ringer24
item.description:
@ringer24 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:23, topic:249681”][quote author=ringer24 link=topic=329101.msg2576125#msg2576125 date=1228959637]
This weapon is religiously discriminating people! What if someone is Muslim? Buddhist? Satanic? Jewish? ect?
[/quote]

Zeus a Mythological Greek god. not necessarily a religious figure so no, this isnt religious discrimination. greek mythology isnt a religion. if this weapons name offends you, you’re overly sensitive

On topic: its not bad for a 1st model. blade needs more shape and the whole blade should be curved. a scimitar isnt straight until the end. its (by RS’s definition) “A Vicious curved sword” which is true, it is curved.[/quote]

Just trying to point out that fact

Read full topic

Zeus a Mythological Greek god. not necessarily a religious figure so no, this isnt religious discrimination. greek mythology isnt a religion. if this weapons name offends you, you’re overly sensitive

On topic: its not bad for a 1st model. blade needs more shape and the whole blade should be curved. a scimitar isnt straight until the end. its (by RS’s definition) “A Vicious curved sword” which is true, it is curved.

item.title: [RELEASE]Zeus' Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

I’ll give you advice.
Graphics kinda sucks.
No offence.
See thoughts lines. Go up like stairs. You need to add effort. Don’t be in a rush and make them straight.
Add Shadows and lines. Even add More colors.
The handle needs a curve at the bottom.
I should make one of these ^^

Read full topic
